data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Békés that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Békés, Hungary
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 11,509 believers in Békés, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 32 lost neighbors

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Békés, Hungary.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Jesus, 376,700 people live in the state of Békés. Please, give them 75 new simple churches this year.
Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Jew, Hungarian-speaking people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Békés, Hungary a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Békés to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.section_summary:
the state of Békés, Hungary has a population of 376,700.

We estimate Békés has 11,509 people who might know Jesus, 316,348 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 48,843 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 32 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Békés, Hungary know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.
